page.title: 12HOUSING : SWANSEA WEST
page.content:
1) Inter-war private housing is mainly found in the centre of our area, with a mixture of semi- & detached houses.
2) Post-war council housing is concentrated at Sketty Park.This estate has expanded rapidly since the mid-sixties and is considered more desirable than the 1930s council estate at Townhill,particularly because of the improved facilities in the houses. Many council tenants have purchased their houses.
3) Post-war private housing is centred to the West and North of the area. The typical house is semi-detached and has 3 or 4 bedrooms. Since the 1960s, garage/parking areas have become more important as more people have been able to afford their own cars and public transport has declined.
